title: Abilities that deal damage to objectives? (Preferably from long range).
body: (As the title suggests), what are some abilities that deal damage to objectives? The only one I'm aware of is Ezreal's ultimate (Trueshot Barrage).

replies.body:
Do you mean turrets?
Tristanas bombs can be placed on turrets

What do you mean by objectives?

Trueshot does not damage structures, but it damages large monsters like most abilities.

{{champion:202}}  Curtain Call can damage monsters if it hits a nearby champion, {{champion:101}} Arcane Barrage can also damage them, so can {{champion:99}}   Final Spark.
Only ablility that does damage to turrets from a range is zigg's satchel charge. Thats it.

> [{quoted}](name=BladeSteel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=92mNIEGv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-30T02:38:20.195+0000)
>
> Only ablility that does damage to turrets from a range is zigg's satchel charge. Thats it.

Rammus' ult damages turrets.

I said from a distance.
There are others that do damage to turrets. Nid q for example does damage to turrets.
I don't consider his ult to be range, considering it has to be around him to actually do damage.

Most empowered auto attacks do damage to turrets. Lich bane hits can get crazy. Satchel charge is really the only ranged 'ability' that damages them. From there, pets can attack towers: tibbers, morde dragon ghost, yorick ult.
